Content.Text:
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, push harder! It's almost over!
Just a little bit more! One last push!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The baby is here! Look, you have a
healthy little baby boy.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The baby is here! Look, you have an
adorable little girl.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
I am very pleased the baby was born safe
and sound. Congratulations!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, I'm truly thankful to you for
delivering my son.
<PAGE>
Hah, he's so small and adorable. I bet
he'll grow up to be just like <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, I'm deeply indebted to you
for delivering my daughter.
<PAGE>
Hah, she's so small and lovely. I bet
she'll grow up to be just like <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've done well, <MYNAME>. Let's raise
our baby with plenty of love.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I understand you must be very tired, but
could you choose a name for the child?
I must fill out the birth certificate.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of course! Hmm, how should we name our
infant, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not too shabby. A name worthy of our
child. A new addition to our
household... This should be fun.

Work hard with Allen to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus. My own son! I just
know he's gonna be a super active kid!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus. My own daughter!
I just know she'll be so sweet!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it must have been tough on you!
But I'm really happy that our child was 
born healthy!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A name? I had a bunch in mind, but I
just couldn't decide. <MYNAME>, do 
you have any good ideas?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>, huh? That's a great name. Look, 
<CHILD_NAME>, we are your daddy and mommy. 
We love you!

Work hard with Rod to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus. You did a splendid
job delivering our son. Let me pay you
back with a drink sometime.
<PAGE>
I was hoping that you'd be just like my
lovely <MYNAME>! May you grow up to be a
fine young man!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus. You did a splendid
job delivering our daughter. Let me
pay you back with a drink sometime.
<PAGE>
I was hoping that you'd be just like my
lovely <MYNAME>! May you grow up to be a
fine young lady!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My dear <MYNAME>, congratulations! You
must be very happy about our beautiful,
beautiful baby.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, you have thought about the
child's name, yes? Did you settle on a
good one?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>, is it? That's just lovely! 
You picked the perfect name, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
This is the start of our new family
life. <MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>, we'll be very
happy together.

Work hard with Soseki to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, you have done a wonderful
job. Thank you so much for everything!
<PAGE>
He's the sweetest little boy. Hello, my
son! I'm your father. I will take good
care of you!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, you have done a wonderful
job. Thank you so much for everything!
<PAGE>
She's the sweetest little girl. Hello,
my daughter! I'm your father. I will 
take good care of you!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, my darling, congratulations!
Thanks to you, we now have a gorgeous
baby.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's right, we didn't pick a name yet.
<MYNAME>, which name would you like to
give to our baby?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> sounds excellent! I think it 
truly suits our child. 
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, my dear, let's live happily
ever after!

Work hard with Sanjay to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for all your help, Dr. Klaus. 
<PAGE>
A boy? Well, make sure you grow up
to be a reliable young man.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, Dr. Klaus. For all your help.
<PAGE>
A girl? Listen! Make sure you grow up
to be a fine lady like your mother,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, you've been struggling for 
the last nine months.
<PAGE>
Thank you for giving birth to my child.
I'm glad that you're the mother of my 
child.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm not good at picking names. How about
you, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>... That's not bad. <MYNAME>,
<CHILD_NAME>, I'll work really hard for
the both of you.

Work hard with Neil to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, please allow me to express my
gratitude. We appreciate your help.
<PAGE>
A boy? I hope he will have your beauty 
and my courage!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, please allow me to express my
gratitude. We appreciate your help.
<PAGE>
A girl? I hope she will have your beauty
and my courage!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>! You made me very happy today!
I am truly delighted to start a family
with you. Thank you for everything!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There are many noble names in this 
world. <MYNAME>, what are your thoughts?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>? It's a noble name!
<MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>, let's start
living our fairytale life together!

Work hard with Amir to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tina, push harder! It's almost over!
Just a little bit more! One last push!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus!
<PAGE>
I always dreamt of becoming a mother!
I hope he will be full of energy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus!
<PAGE>
I always dreamt of becoming a mother!
I hope she will be sparkling with life.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>! You must be tired, too. I'm so
glad that you were here with me all
the time! Thank you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the name? What name would 
you like, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>? Yeah, I kinda like it! So, from
now on, you're <CHILD_NAME>. How do you
like it?
<PAGE>
<CHILD_NAME>, your mommy's here. Mommy and 
Daddy will try their best to make you
very happy.

Work hard with Tina to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Michelle, push harder! It's almost over!
Just a little bit more! One last push!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, you took such great care of 
me! Thank you very much!
<PAGE>
We have a boy? I hope he'll be as 
handsome as you, my dear <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, you took such great care of
me! Thank you very much!
<PAGE>
We have a girl? I hope she'll have a 
wonderful heart like you, my
dear <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, I'm so tired! Will you treat
me to something special afterwards? I
can't wait!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Honey, <MYNAME>! Will you decide on the
child's name? Think of something cute 
for our baby, okay?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>? Lovely! <MYNAME>, let's raise 
our baby with love.

Work hard with Michelle to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yuri, push harder! It's almost over!
Just a little bit more! One last push!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you... He's just... like <MYNAME>...
How wonderful...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you... She's just... like
<MYNAME>... How wonderful...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>... Will you... choose a name?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<CHILD_NAME>... I like it... Do you
like it, <CHILD_NAME>?

Work hard with Yuri to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Iroha, push harder! It's almost over!
Just a little bit more! One last push!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, you've been very supportive.
How can I ever thank you enough?
<PAGE>
It's a boy... I hope you will become a
righteous gentleman one day.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dr. Klaus, you've been very supportive! 
How can I ever thank you enough?
<PAGE>
It's a girl... I hope you will become a 
fair maiden one day.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you too, <MYNAME>, for all your
support.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you gave me strength just by 
staying by my side.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm. <MYNAME>, what would be an 
appropriate name for this child?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see. So, you like <CHILD_NAME>? I like the 
sound of it.
<PAGE>
As the mother of this child, I must work
hard to raise it well. I'll do my best.

Work hard with Iroha to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Felicity, push harder! It's almost over!
Just a little bit more! One last push!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus!
<PAGE>
Teeheehee.<RED>∀</RED> I finally became a 
mother. He's such a lovely boy.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Dr. Klaus!
<PAGE>
Teeheehee.<RED>∀</RED> I finally became a 
mother. She's such a lovely girl.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, I did it!
<PAGE>
My dear, <MYNAME>! Our bond will grow 
even stronger from now on.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I understand you must be very tired, but
could you choose a name for the child?
I must write the birth certificate.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The name is very important. I'll leave
this to Daddy. Any thoughts?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Such a lovely name!<RED>∀</RED> <CHILD_NAME>, I'll cook
a lot of yummy dishes for you and one
day you'll be a gourmet, just like me!

Work hard with Felicity to raise
<CHILD_NAME> well.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Push harder! It's almost over!
Just a little bit more! One last push!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for the help, doctor. 
<PAGE>
Well, well. If it isn't a cute boy just 
like my sweet <MYNAME>. Lovely. I guess
all the pain was worth it after all.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for the help, doctor. 
<PAGE>
Well, well. What a cute girl, just as
sweet as my <MYNAME>. Lovely. I guess
all the pain was worth it after all.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, sweetie pie, you must be tired.
I'm glad you were here with me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Now, a good name is the source of one's
power, so let's be careful here.
<MYNAME>, sweetie, anything on your mind?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>? Well, isn't that special?
I can see an enormous potential in this
child. Grow and become powerful.

Work hard with the Witch Princess to
raise <CHILD_NAME> well.
Allen
Rod
Soseki
Sanjay
Neil
Amir
Tina
Michelle
Yuri
Iroha
Felicity
Witch Princess
Next

Debug Option: Choose the event for the 
selected character.
How about <BLUE><CHILD_NAME></BLUE>?
This sounds right.
Think of something else.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you waiting for? Pick a name
for your child.
